name: dingdong
description:
dingdong is a Pong clone made with C++ using SDL libraries! It features:

- 4 different game modes: single player, practice mode, local multiplayer and online multiplayer!

- Awesome, completely original art and music!

- Discord Rich Presence support!  

- Tiny size! (only 22MBs!)

- Fully open source! You can get the source code by clicking here.

Intructions:

Use up/down arrow keys or W/S to move up and down respectively.

If the game mode is local multiplayer, the paddle on the left uses W/S, while the paddle on the right uses up and down arrow keys.

If the game mode is online multiplayer, the host is the paddle on the left, and the joiner is the paddle on the right.

I hope you like the game!
